EmailTemplate.name: User Story Creator Template
EmailTemplate.subject: User Story {!copado__User_Story__c.copado__User_Story_Title__c} is PO reviewed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!copado__User_Story__c.copado__Business_Analyst__c},
The user story {!copado__User_Story__c.copado__User_Story_Title__c} is PO reviewed. Please proceed to take this for refinement.
Thank you,
HIVE.
